name: Space Arcade (Dani, PepperBox-Games)
description:
A collaboration between Pepperbox (https://pepperbox-games.itch.io) & myself for the GMTK GameJame 2020.

Music was provided by BurnOut, more work at https://soundcloud.com/pumpkinhead-514138613 or https://burn0ut.bandcamp.com/

Two mini games; Space control is where your ship is out of fuel and you have to prevent enemies from getting to you. Drag them into each other to destroy them. Control Swap is where your ships controls are damaged and randomly switch, try to get as many minerals as you can before your controls swap and avoid the enemies.

Controls

Space Control: Use mouse to drag enemies

Control Swap: WASD to move

Esc is pause in both games
